trans-unit.source: Provides design-time visual support for <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona la compatibilidad visual en tiempo de diseño para los controles <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner> class is the abstract base class for both <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner>, which all the other zone designers inherit from.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner> clase es la clase base abstracta para ambos <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner> y <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner>, que heredan todos los otros diseñadores de zona.

trans-unit.source: By inheriting directly from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> instead of <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner>, it allows implementations of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method that do not automatically clear the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection, thus enabling the designer to render exceptions from child controls.
trans-unit.target: Al heredar directamente de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> en lugar de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner>, permite que las implementaciones de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método que no borran automáticamente la <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> colección, lo que permite el diseñador representar las excepciones de los controles secundarios.

trans-unit.source: Like other designers in this namespace, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner> overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property to always return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Al igual que otros diseñadores en este espacio de nombres, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner> invalida la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propiedad que se devuelva siempre `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner" /> class does not have a public constructor, so you cannot inherit from it directly outside the <see cref="N:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts" /> namespace.
trans-unit.target: El <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner" /> clase no tiene un constructor público, por lo que no se puede heredar de él directamente fuera el <see cref="N:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts" /> espacio de nombres.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone" /> control associated with the designer.
Creates an instance of the designer bound to the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Crea una instancia del diseñador enlazada al control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone" /> asociado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si el diseñador debe usar una copia temporal, en lugar del control real que está asociado al diseñador, para generar el marcado en tiempo de diseño.
